title: SQL ServerPI()Function

metadata.description: Learn about SQL ServerPI()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
❯
Example
Return the value of PI:
SELECT PI();

Definition and Usage
The PI() function returns the value of PI.
Note:
Also look at the
DEGREES()
and
RADIANS()
functions.
Syntax
PI()
Technical Details
Works in:
SQL Server (starting with 2008), Azure SQL Database, Azure SQL Data 
  Warehouse, Parallel Data Warehouse

❯
★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers SQL ServerPI()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use SQL ServerPI()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of SQL ServerPI()Function and how to apply it in your projects.
